exercises.title: Gentle Precision
exercises.text: Slow is smooth; smooth is fast. Small improvements compound quickly.

exercises.title: Soft Reset
exercises.text: Reset, then continue. Less tension, better control.

exercises.title: Soft Reset
exercises.text: Aim for an even tempo. If you rush, you lose the pattern.

exercises.text: Accuracy arrives before speed. Your best pace is the one you can sustain.
